title.narrative: Restoring Degraded Forest Landscapes and Promoting Community-based, Sustainable and Integrated Natural Resource Management in the Rora Habab Plateau, Nakfa Sub-zoba, Northern Red Sea Region of Eritrea

description.narrative: Component 2: Implementation of on-the-ground interventions to reduce land degradation and pressure on forests and increase agricultural productivity,Component 3: Knowledge management and awareness raising,project management cost,Component 1:Institutional capacity and enabling framework for integrated landscape management in over 80,000 ha in the Nakfa sub-Zoba
